DOC.brief_summary: Both dietary caloric restriction ( CR ) physical exercise ( PE ) exert beneficial effect , retard prevent age-related disease prolong life span . Subjects metabolic syndrome age prematurely , therefore preventive measure initiate early . The present study intend demonstrate physical exercise and/or Mediterranean diet , middle age volunteer metabolic syndrome , preserve adequate adipose tissue functionality retard skeletal muscle age ( assess mitochondrial biogenesis accumulation ROS ) , activate several pathway , homologous CR . The investigator plan study use two approach : 1 ) A cross- sectional model , expression mention metabolic mediator , indicator muscle mitochondrial biogenesis muscle oxidative damage compare men different body composition , fat distribution , muscle strength exercise capacity ( VO2max ) . Also , men investigator assess expression uncouple protein 1 ( UCP1 ) subcutaneous white adipose tissue ( measure adaptive thermogenesis ) , inflammatory marker ( Interleukin 1-6 , Interleukin 1ß CCL2 chemokine ( C-C motif ligand 2 ) ) preperitoneal adipose tissue , plus inflammation adipogenesis potential culture preadipocytes . Moreover , vitro study evaluate functional effect exposure cell lyne human adipocyte cell ( LS14 ) factor secrete medium condition patients´ adipose tissue explants . 2 ) A prospective intervention overweight/moderately obese middle age volunteer assign weight-maintenance period ( control group ) , randomly assign Mediterranean diet , exercise training diet plus training . Before 3 month intervention investigator obtain muscle tissue sample study expression Peroxisome proliferator activate receptor ( PPAR ) gamma coactivator 1 alpha ( PGC1 ) , uncouple protein 3 ( UCP3 ) , AMP activate protein kinase ( AMPK ) , Sirtuin 1 ( SIRT-1 ) , mitochondrial DNA oxidative damage indicator ( 8-oxo-7,8-dihydro-2-deoxyguanosine ( oxodG ) , carboxymethyllysine ( CML receptor ( RAGE ) ) . In vitro study evaluate effect circulate factor patient ( serum ) LS14 inflammatory adipogenic potential , baseline 3 month intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Beneficial Effects Exercise Healthy Diets Muscle Adipose Tissue
DOC.detailed_description: METHODOLOGY : This study compose 2 part : I - CROSS SECTIONAL STUDY The aim section compare men different body composition , fat distribution exercise capacity respect muscle mitochondrial biogenesis , oxidative damage energy flux regulator molecule , together adipose tissue inflammation , adipokine expression thermogenic potential . Inclusion criterion : - male sex - age 25 - 50 year - BMI 20 - 35 kg/mt2 - indication surgery inguinal hernia Exclusion criterion : - diabetes mellitus - chronic neuromuscular neurological deficit preclude normal physical activity - heavy smoking ( > 5 cigarette per day ) - alcohol intake > 30 g/day - chronic disease cancer , HIV-AIDS , renal , pulmonary , cardiac hepatic condition . Before operation sign write informed consent , follow assessment perform : 1 . Medical history include medication intake complete physical examination . 2 . Dietary recall habitual intake calculation AGEs ingestion . 3 . Regular physical activity assessment use International Physical Activity Questionnaire 4 . Anthropometrics ( height , weight , waist circumference ) 5 . Fasting blood sample routine determination ( haemoglobin , lipoproteins , creatinine , prothrombin , TSH ) , AGEs concentration ( CML ) free fatty acid , adiponectin 8- Isoprostanes . 6 . Fasting post glucose serum sample glucose insulin measurement , calculation Homeostasis Model Assessment ( HOMA-IR ) Matsuda Index determination peripheral insulin sensitivity . 7 . Resting exercise indirect calorimetry estimation rest energy expenditure , respiratory quotient VO2 max . 8 . Handgrip quadriceps muscle strength 9 . Dual X-Ray Energy Densitometry ( DEXA ) estimation body composition 10 . CT scan abdominal region L4 level measurement visceral subcutaneous fat area estimation liver fat infiltration . 11 . Ultrasound intensity analysis thigh ultrasonography indicate muscle fat infiltration . After initial evaluation , subject classify without metabolic syndrome , accord international guideline guideline , analysis data . A day later , surgical procedure , sample muscle tissue ( approximately 200 mg internal abdominal oblique ) obtain measurement : 1 . Fiber type 2 . Messenger Ribonucleic acid ( mRNA ) expression PGC-1-alpha , SIRT-1 , UCP-3 AMPK 3 . Mitochondrial density measurement mitDNA Cytochrome C activity 4 . Oxidative damage ( 8-oxodG , CML RAGE ) . During operation , 2 sample adipose tissue also obtain , one subcutaneous ( site incision ) preperitoneal ( inguinal sac ) , vitro study : 1 . UCP1 inflammatory marker ( interleukin 6 , 1ß , CCL2 ) expression mature adipocytes 2 . Inflammatory profile adipogenic potential ( expression lipoprotein lipase , PPAR gamma adiponectin ) culture preadipocytes 3 . Adipogenic potential inflammatory expression profile LS14 adipose cell expose conditioned medium adipose tissue explants . A small part adipose tissue sample place formaldehyde , fix stain H.E histologic estimation adipocyte cell size . II - INTERVENTION STUDY This section intend demonstrate effect low-AGEs Mediterranean diet and/or exercise , skeletal muscle metabolic profile adipogenic/inflammatory feature adipocytes . Inclusion criterion : - Overweight obese men woman - Ages 25 - 50 year - Interest lose weight Exclusion criterion : - weight fluctuation ( > 3 k last 3 month ) - diabetes mellitus - chronic neuromuscular neurologic diseases - heavy smoking ( > 5 cigarette per day ) - alcohol intake > 30 g/day - chronic disease cancer , HIV , renal , pulmonary , cardiac hepatic condition . Subjects invited participate trial use Mediterranean low-AGEs diet and/or physical exercise 3 month . After sign write informed consent , subject allocate one intervention , randomly select , follow assessment perform , baseline 3 month intervention : 1 . Medical medication intake history complete physical examination . 2 . Dietary recall habitual intake calculation AGEs ingestion . 3 . Physical activity questionnaire ( IPAQ ) 4 . Anthropometrics ( height , weight , waist circumference ) 5 . Fasting blood sample routine determination ( haemoglobin , lipoproteins , creatinine , prothrombin TSH ) , AGEs concentration ( CML ) , free fatty acid , adiponectin , 8-Isoprostanes serum vitro adipose tissue study ( see ) . 6 . Fasting post glucose blood sample glucose insulin measurement , calculation HOMA-IR Matsuda Index determination peripheral insulin sensitivity . 7 . Dual X-Ray Energy Densitometry ( DEXA ) estimation body composition 8 . CT scan abdominal region L4 level measurement visceral subcutaneous fat area estimation liver fat infiltration 9 . Resting exercise indirect calorimetry estimation rest energy expenditure , respiratory quotient VO2 max . 10 . Handgrip quadriceps muscle strength 11 . Ultrasound intensity analysis thigh indicate muscle fat infiltration 12 . Ultrasound guide quadriceps muscle biopsy measure mitochondrial density ( mitDNA ) expression PGC-1
DOC.criteria: CROSS SECTIONAL : male sex , age 25 50 year , BMI range 20 35 kg/mt2 . INTERVENTION STUDY : Overweight obese men woman age 25 50 year interested lose weight , CROSS SECTIONAL : diabetes mellitus , chronic neuromuscular neurological deficit preclude normal physical activity , heavy smoking ( > 5 cigarette per day ) , alcohol intake > 30 g/day chronic disease cancer , HIVAIDS , renal , pulmonary , cardiac hepatic condition . INTERVENTION STUDY : weight fluctuation ( > 3 k last 3 month ) , diabetes mellitus , chronic neuromuscular neurologic disease , heavy smoking ( > 5 cigarette per day ) alcohol intake > 30 g/day , chronic disease cancer , HIV , renal , pulmonary , cardiac hepatic condition .
